verses.verse: Not <S%H3808><s%> unto us, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> unto us, <S%H3588>but<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H571>truth's<s%> sake.
But our <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath <S%H2654>pleased.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have they, but they <S%H7200>see<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H639>noses<s%> have they, but they <S%H7306>smell<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

They have <S%H3027>hands,<s%> but they <S%H4184>handle<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> have they, but they <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1897>speak<s%> they through their <S%H1627>throat.<s%>
They that <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H1961>are<s%> like unto <S%H3644>them;<s%> so is every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in them.
O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> thou in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
Ye that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is their <S%H5828>help<s%> and their <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath been <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of us: he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> us; he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H5973>and<s%> <S%H1419>great.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall increase you more and <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you and your <S%H1121>children.<s%>
Ye <S%H859><s%> are <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> even the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> are the <S%H3068>LORD's:<s%> but the <S%H776>earth<s%> hath he <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
But <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> from this time <S%H4480>forth<s%> <S%H6258><s%> and <S%H5704>forevermore.<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
